name: Mahjong Classic
description: Do you have this feeling that your life is becoming more and more boring? All you need to stave off the boredom is to level up your brain. Resolve the puzzles, take part in daily competitions, win the prizes and collection cards.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 950 MB available space Sound Card: Any sound card capable of stereo output
